name: Mortal Kombat 1: Mavado Kameo
summary:
Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Mavado is returning as a Kameo Fighter and was previously playable in Mortal Kombat Armageddon.

He was introduced to the series in Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance as a playable character and his most recent appearance was in the Mortal Kombat X comics where he is eventually killed by Cassie Cage and Jacqui.
